participant_1.name: John
participant_1.personality: caring and reflective, enjoys sharing knowledge and experiences.
participant_1.background: i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: adventurous and straightforward, values fitness and enjoys outdoor activities.
participant_2.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i hate the color pink. my father was a construction worker. i don't drink alcohol. i'm a huge coffee lover.

content.text: hi! I am a gym teacher. what do you do for a living?
Why are you saying me that?
I am retired. I volunteer for a gym. do you have any hobbies?
Ah okay, it seems that there plenty of time if you're retired)
that is a lot of time. I volunteer as a retired teacher. do you like it?
voulunteer as a retired teached - it is very strange
